availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver P. Spencer (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Sidney Spencer. Father of Sidney E. Spencer and Noah W. Spencer. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1860. Captain in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry Regiment from November 6, 1861 to December 17, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 2, p. 126.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 69.
California, Death Index, 1905-1939, p. 10331-10332. Accessed via Ancestry.com.
